EmailTemplate.name: 2020 Dealer Update #3.2020 Dealer Update #3
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Sales Bulletins - March 30, 2020
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Sales Bulletins | March 2020 New Sales and Operator Bulletins Honeywell is pleased to announce the following bulletins:
- 2020-01 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020-01 Rev B_ADS-B Upgrade for Business Aircraft with Primus II RM-855.pdf]]> Rev B ADS-B Upgrade For Business Aircraft with RM-855 - 2020-02 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020-02 Rev B_ADS-B Upgrade for Business Aircraft with Primus II RM-850.pdf]]> Rev B ADS-B Upgrade For Business Aircraft with RM-850 - 2020-18 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020-18 RDR7000 Trade-In Promotion for Business Aircraft.pdf]]> RDR 7000 Trade-in Promotion for Business Aircraft - 2020-26 Rev A <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020-26 Rev 2 Ovation Select CS Cabin Management System MHT to OST Upgrade for Business Aircraft.pdf]]> Ovation Select CS Cabin Management System MHT to OST Upgrade for Business Aircraft - 2020-27 Rev A <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020-27 Rev 2 Ovation Select CS Cabin Management System MHT to OST Upgrade for F900 and F2000 Aircraft.pdf]]> Ovation Select CS Cabin Management System MHT to OST Upgrade for F900 and F2000 Aircraft -
